page.title: 15CLAY PIGEON SHOOT
page.content: The shoot is a private club only for club members. The shoot is near the Ostrich Inn, in a field. People take their own guns and some people take their own dogs. The people shoot for fun, they don't want to shoot real birds. They shoot clay pigeons instead. A clay pigeon is a clay disc. Some people go to watch them shoot. They go on Sundays. On Saturdays they set it up. My brother works on a trap. A trap is something that holds clay pigeons. A trap makes the clay pigeon go up in to the air. Some traps have seats. To work a trap you have to pull a lever with a clay pigeon on and then you let go of the lever and the clay pigeon flies into the air.
